Template.CandidateDescription:
Dear {CandName},

First, I would like to thank you for your flexibility during this time. The entire WonderBiz community is working remotely as we navigate the COVID-19 global health crisis together. While we typically strive for in-person meetings, our recruiting procedures have been adjusted to ensure the health and safety of our team members and candidates. Given that this is new to some of our team members, we greatly appreciate your patience throughout your interview process.

Below are the details for your video interview. Take a look, and if you have any queshttps://accounts.google.com/b/0/AddMailServicetions, don't hesitate to reply to this email.

Date: {InterviewDate}
Time: {InterviewTime}

Zoom Link: 

{ZoomUrl}

Meeting ID: {MeetingId}

Passcode: {PassCode}


Zoom Support: https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201362593-Launching-Zoom-from-a-web-browser 
Please reply to confirm that this date and time still work for you. 

Note:
Try to log in 10 min prior to the scheduled time.
Make sure you are joining the Zoom link from the Laptop / Desktop only. It will be required to share your screen.
It's a video call so make sure your webcam is working and it's ON during the interview.
Also, make sure Visual Studio / Net Beans / Eclipse is installed on your laptop as it's a technical round. So you will need to do some coding on it.
Kindly recheck your Webcam, Mic (Headphones), and Audio (Speaker) of your Laptop / Desktop before you start the interview. If you are logging in from Desktop simultaneously connect from Mobile too for Audio and Video.
If you get disconnected in between/after 40min kindly rejoin by using the same link.

In preparation for your interview, I encourage you to read more about WonderBiz's core values and Benefits. They are the foundation of who we are and how we support each other and our clients. The people you'll be meeting with are looking for candidates who can demonstrate these values. You'll also want to prepare a list of questions for each person you're meeting with to better evaluate if this is a good fit for you.

Visit Us: www.wonderbizglobal.com
LinkedIn:
https://www.linkedin.com/company/wonderbiz-technologies
Also if you can give Quick Feedback before your Interview:
https://forms.gle/AvKx169SDUsxztRE9

Thanks, and good luck with your interview!

Dear {CandName},

Thank you for taking the time to talk to us about the {CandPosition} position.
We enjoyed getting to know you and we'd like to invite you for the last round.

Below are the details for your video interview. Take a look, and if you have any questions, don't hesitate to reply to this email.

Date: {InterviewDate}
Time: {InterviewTime}



Join Zoom Meeting
{ZoomUrl}

Meeting ID: {MeetingId}

Password: {PassCode}




Zoom Link: Shared via Calendar Invite
Zoom Support: https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201362593-Launching-Zoom-from-a-web-browser



Note:
    1. Try to log in 10 min prior to the scheduled time.
    2. Make sure you are joining the Zoom link from the Laptop / Desktop only. It will be required to share your screen.
    3. It's a video call so make sure your webcam is working and it's ON during the interview.
    4. Also, make sure Visual Studio / Net Beans / Eclipse is installed on your laptop as it's a technical round.
    5. Kindly recheck your Webcam, Mic (Headphones), and Audio (Speaker) of your Laptop / Desktop before you start the interview. If you are logging in from Desktop simultaneously connect from Mobile too for Audio and Video.
    6. If you get disconnected in between/after 40min kindly rejoin by using the same link.

Looking forward to meeting you again,
Also if you can give Quick Feedback before your Interview:
https://forms.gle/AvKx169SDUsxztRE9

Thanks, and good luck with your interview!
